hero.title: Contribute
hero.subtitle: Help make Ashtanga Yoga accessible to everyone

intro.title: Join the effort
intro.text: Start Ashtanga is a collaborative project, anyone can help improve it. All our content is freely available and we welcome contributions from practitioners around the world.

items.title: Content & translations
items.description: Help improve existing content, fix typos, or translate the site into your language to reach more practitioners worldwide.

items.title: Suggest improvements
items.description: Have ideas for new features, better explanations, or resources we should add? We'd love to hear your suggestions.

items.title: Development
items.description: This is an open-source project built with React and TypeScript. Help us build new features, fix bugs, or improve the codebase.

items.title: Spread the word
items.description: Share Start Ashtanga with fellow practitioners, yoga studios, or anyone curious about beginning their Ashtanga journey.

shala.title: Share your shala
shala.text: Know a great Mysore program? Help us build a global directory so beginners can find authentic teachers near them.
shala.note: We're currently collecting shala information from the community. Once we have enough data to represent the global Ashtanga community fairly, we'll publish the directory â€” we don't want to favor just a few places.
shala.coming: Coming soon: We'll also be collecting information about workshops and events.

wanted.title: Help wanted
wanted.text: We're actively looking for help with these larger projects:

items.title: Shala directory backend
items.description: Build a system to manage and display Mysore shalas worldwide, database design, API, and admin tools.

items.title: Logo design
items.description: Create an identity for Start Ashtanga. We're considering a logo contest, reach out if you're interested!

items.title: Social media
items.description: Help create and maintain our social media presence to grow the community and share updates.

items.title: Resources library
items.description: Curate and maintain a library of books, articles, and other learning materials for practitioners.

technical.title: For developers
technical.text: This project is open source and built with React, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS. If you're a developer, you can contribute code, report issues, or help build new features.

cta.title: Ready to contribute?
cta.text: Every contribution, big or small, helps make Ashtanga more accessible.
